channel.title: IS There A Way To Make A Command That Restarts Server?
channel.description:
can some 1 tell em If they know the code 4 a command that will restart server like
if u type ::restart it restarts the server also..if any1 knows how to make it u cant use melle in wild?could u tell me cos my server just crashers when u use melle in wild
